fields_of_interest: Education and training, Energy, Taxation, Research and innovation, Public Health, Climate Action
eu_initiatives:
European Fund for Strategic Investments 
Cohesion policy 
Health policy 
Framework Program Horizon Europe
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
relevant_communication: the organization organizes conferences which concern topics indicated in the area of interest. Conferences are held in Poland, they have the dimension of events on a national scale.
goals__remit: The Łódź Academic Foundation deals with the development of entrepreneurship among people with disabilities and training in the area of higher education. The organization also focuses on the promotion of pro-health attitudes in society.
